biotools.summary: De novo computational method identifies new LTR (long terminal repeat) retrotransposons without relying on a library of known elements. Specifically, the method identifies intact LTR retrotransposons by using an approximate string matching technique and protein domain analysis.

bioschemas.name: MGEScan-LTR
bioschemas.summary: De novo computational method identifies new LTR (long terminal repeat) retrotransposons without relying on a library of known elements. Specifically, the method identifies intact LTR retrotransposons by using an approximate string matching technique and protein domain analysis.
